paragraph.text: During the last 10 years I have studied several different areas of design. I love the process of converting a design into an actual product.
I believe in user-friendly websites which are accessible for a wide set of audiences. I develop component based websites, in this way they are build to last.
I can build from scratch or work with popular frameworks like bootstrap or foundation. And if a CMS is needed I work with programs like Silverstripe or Wordpress.
